NO essential regulation blood pressure , glucose lipid balance . This evident e-NOsynthase knockout mouse exhibit insulin resistance , hypertension hyperlipidemia , cluster disease also observe metabolic syndrome . Recently , show adiponectin regulate eNOsynthase activity phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase-dependent pathway wherein eNOsynthase phosphorylated 5'-AMP-activated protein kinase Ser1179 plasma adiponectin level inversely correlate BMI , waist-to-hip ratio , fast plasma glucose , insulin , triglyceride , hyperinsulinemia , glucose intolerance positively HDL-cholesterol , BP . This study use randomise single-blind , placebo-controlled design . Following 1-week run-in phase , group randomise one two group : placebo-polyphenol-rich DC , polyphenol-rich DC-placebo .
